dict.acceptation: 床；苗圃；河床；（地下由黏土、岩石等构成的）地层；
把…固定在；（某人）发生性关系；给人铺床；

sent.orig: Review and comment on specialist engineering aspects of BED and EPC contractors deliverables.
sent.trans: 审核和评论BED和EPC承包商交付的专家工程设计方面内容。

sent.orig: The bed of the Bi type (the main bed and bed legs) or overall style.
sent.trans: 该床的型式为双节式（主床和腿床）或整体式。

sent.orig: There is a small bed, a bed side table and a closet in the bed room.
sent.trans: 卧室有一张小床、床头柜和衣柜。

sent.orig: Main Products: Folding bed, Double bed, Single bed, Bunkbed All-steel Furniture Steel-wood Composite body Furniture.
sent.trans: 主要产品：折合床，高床，矮床，钢制家具，钢木结合家具。

sent.orig: The editor went to bed after he put the newspaper tp bed.
sent.trans: 编辑将报纸付印之后就去睡觉了。
